research_municipality_step.notes: The elected officials for Bevil Oaks city, TX, including the Mayor and City Council members, were identified from the Texas Municipal League City Officials Directory and the City of Bevil Oaks website. All listed terms are current as of February 2026. Louis Merendino is also referred to as 'Bud Merendino' in some sources.
